name: Jaw-Bloomed
description: Twisted by sacred hunger, the Jaw-Bloomed are all muscle and maw. Their fungal jaws split wide as they charge, not to speak â€” but to consume. They revel in the violence that nourishes the world to come.
abilities: Fungal Bite: When this model makes an attack, if the target is wounded, they must make a Resolve test. If they fail, they suffer -1 to their Toughness until the end of the round.
Spore-Fueled Rage: This model can use its action to perform a Resolve test. If successful, it gains +1 to its Strength until the end of the round.
